Successfully compiled Owned! Successfully executed

Nothing happens on the game at all…

Read full topic

item.title: Darblat Awesome Script!
item.dc:creator: @remoladen remoladen
item.description:
@remoladen wrote:

This is my First official Script. It works Awesomely!! If it doesn’t work the first time try it again. It sometimes messes up. I got 600 score using this!

[code]// Dar-Blat //
// By: Michael, Kyrndao and 413X //
// //
// 1. Open game in 800 by 600 resolution //
// 2. Specify game client //
// 3. Run the script and with it OWN //
// //
// Even a little bit of lag can have an effect //
// on your score. You can edit the wait time //
// at the bottom of the script so it doesn’t //
// hit aboce the Darblat. //
// HAVE FUN //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program DarBlat;
var x,y:integer;
begin
clickmouse(318, 450 , true);
wait(1000)

repeat
wait(1);
until not(findcolortolerance(x,y,16575166,235,178,240,183, 0 ));
wait(0); // Change if the snowball hits too early or too late.
keydown(32);
wait(15);
keyup(32);
writeln(’ Owned!’)

end.(’ Owned!’)

end.[/code]

Read full topic
